tasks.task: Applying soil treatment solution for fungus gnat prevention during first watering.
subtasks: Evenly distribute treatment solution over the majority of the soil surface.

tasks.task: Ensuring proper plant hydration during initial watering.
subtasks: Watering plants thoroughly to allow solution to spread deeply into the soil.

tasks.task: Preparing soil treatment solution before applying.
subtasks: Measuring and mixing ingredients according to instructions.
Ensuring solution is well-combined and ready for application.

tasks.task: Positioning plants properly for watering.
subtasks: Aligning plants in the growing area.
Ensuring water can reach the base of each plant.

tasks.task: Preparing soil treatment solution. The subtasks for that could be measuring the ingredients, maybe mixing them in a container, and making sure the solution is ready.
Positioning plants for watering.
Obtaining and mixing soil treatment solution.
subtasks: Locating and retrieving the necessary ingredients.

tasks.task: Obtaining and mixing soil treatment solution:
subtasks: Locate and retrieve the solution and any necessary ingredients.
Mix the solution according to instructions.

tasks.task: Applying the solution to soil:
subtasks: Evenly distribute the solution over the soil surface (most of it).

tasks.task: Positioning plants for initial watering.
Watering the plants for the first time.
Ensuring even coverage of soil treatment solution.
Getting ready to apply soil treatment solution.
subtasks: Check that all necessary equipment is available (sprayer, trowel, etc.).

tasks.task: Applying soil treatment solution.
Ensuring proper watering for fungus gnat prevention.
Preparing soil treatment solution
Applying the solution to the soil.
Positioning plants for watering.
Watering the plants
Apply soil treatment solution evenly to most soil surface.
Water plants thoroughly for the first time.
Applying soil treatment solution for fungus gnat prevention during first watering.**
subtasks: ** Evenly distribute the treatment solution over the majority of the soil surface to ensure even spread when watered.

tasks.task: Ensuring proper plant hydration during initial watering.**
subtasks: ** Water the plants thoroughly to allow the solution to penetrate the soil, thereby preventing fungus gnats.

tasks.task: Preparing the soil treatment solution before application.**
subtasks: ** Measure and mix the ingredients according to instructions, ensuring the solution is well-combined.

tasks.task: Positioning the plants for optimal watering.**
subtasks: ** Align the plants in the growing area to ensure water reaches each plant and check that the soil surface is accessible for applying the solution.
